A

attack(Creature) - Method in interface gameinterfaces.Creature
This method displays a message containing the following:
"this.name attacks target creature's name, dealing damage damage"

B

Battle - Interface in gameinterfaces
 

C

canEnrage() - Method in interface gameinterfaces.Monster
This method returns true if monster hitPoints falls below this.enrageThreshold.
Creature - Interface in gameinterfaces
A class that implements this interface should have the following attributes: name: String description: String hitPoints: int damage: int room: Room The implementing class should only have the following constructor: public Creature(String name, String description, int hitPoints, int damage) room should be initialized to null provide getters for the following attributes: name, description, hitPoints, damage, Room.

E

enrage() - Method in interface gameinterfaces.Monster
This method will double this.damage for this Monster if it hasn't already been enraged.
enter(Player) - Method in interface gameinterfaces.Room
This method will display the message:

"player name" "This Room is this.description, and has this.monster"

If the monster isAlive() allow the player to enter the room and start a battle
enter(Player) - Method in interface gameinterfaces.TreasureRoom
This method will display the message:

"This Room is this.description, and has this.monster"

If the monster isAlive() allow the player to enter the room and start a battle If player is alive, display the message:

"You explored the room and found the hidden treasure!"

G

Game - Interface in gameinterfaces
A class that implements this interface should have the following attributes: player: Player dungeon: Room[] The implementing class should only have the following constructor: public Game(): 1.
gameinterfaces - package gameinterfaces
 

H

heal() - Method in interface gameinterfaces.Player
This method will increase the hitPoints for this Player by this.healAmount.

I

isAlive() - Method in interface gameinterfaces.Creature
This method return true if this Creature has positive hitPoints.
isComplete() - Method in interface gameinterfaces.Room
This method returns true if the Monster in this Room has died.

M

Monster - Interface in gameinterfaces
A class that implements this interface should have the following attributes: isEnraged: boolean enrageThreshold: int The implementing class should only have the following constructor: public Monster(String name, String description, int hitPoints, int damage, int enrageThreshold)

P

play() - Method in interface gameinterfaces.Game
This method let this.player enter each room in order and battle against monsters.
Player - Interface in gameinterfaces
A class that implements this interface should have the following attributes: healAmount: int The implementing class should only have the following constructor: public Player(String name, String description, int hitPoints, int damage, int healAmount)

R

Room - Interface in gameinterfaces
A class that implements this interface should have the following attributes: roomIndex: int description: String monster: Monster The implementing class should only have the following constructor: public Room(int roomIndex, String description, Monster monster)
run() - Method in interface gameinterfaces.Battle
 

T

takeDamage(int) - Method in interface gameinterfaces.Creature
This method subtracts the specified amount of damage from hitPoits.
toString() - Method in interface gameinterfaces.Creature
 
toString() - Method in interface gameinterfaces.Room
 
TreasureRoom - Interface in gameinterfaces
A class that implements this interface should have the following attributes: treasure: String The implementing class should only have the following constructor: public TreasureRoom(String description, Monster monster, String treasure)
